I was responsible for CIVIL department including:

forward to finalize the approval .

Elevation, Wardrobe details etc.
Creating animated views and following up with clients requirement.
Detailed Theory of whole design before executing it to final step it is sent to client to 
cross check if any alteration required as per their project.
